Topic.Title: Uploading Quest games to Activelit groups

Posts.EditableText:
Hi

I have an activelit group for my students.

How can students who have written their games in the downloadable PC version of Quest add their games to the page?

I can see how to publish games on through the textadventures site by uploading, but not how to attach an uploaded game to an activelit group. 

Thanks for your help

Yours

Andrew
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Upload their games to ActiveLit or thr online Quest? Which one?
Posts.HTML: Upload their games to ActiveLit or thr online Quest? Which one?

Posts.EditableText:
How they can upload games to the Activelit page. (Or attached a game uploaded to textadventures to the active lit page.)

Or: 
Can they only publish games created on the browser to the Activelit page?
